blabbs.author: Shubham Singh
blabbs.content: Just finished implementing a new trading algorithm using reinforcement learning. The results are promising with a Sharpe ratio of 2.3!

blabbs.author: Shubham Singh
blabbs.content: Reading 'The Concepts and Practice of Mathematical Finance' by Mark Joshi. Highly recommend for anyone interested in quant finance.

blabbs.author: Shubham Singh
blabbs.content: Excited to share that my paper on market impact models has been accepted for publication! #QuantFinance #Research

blabbs.author: Shubham Singh
blabbs.content: Just watched 'The Big Short' again. Still one of the best finance movies ever made. What's your favorite finance movie?
